message: Dr. Winston W. Royce "Waterfall Father (as people thinking)" just identified this pattern (without naming it Waterfall) and describing its deficiencies and proposing enhancements, these suggested enhancements are considered now as the basics of agile :)
story: Mostafa Abdelghffar shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Why Waterfall was a big misunderstanding from the beginning - reading the original paper
caption: pragtob.wordpress.com
description: You probably know that there is the Waterfall process - by now feared by most as "the father of the plan driven approach". Some may even know that Waterfall was supposedly "invented" by the paper "...
